sentences.sContent: a deep cut that could leave a permanent scar
sentences.sCn: 可能会留下永久性疤痕的一道很深的伤口

sentences.sContent: He had a long, curved scar on his right cheek.
sentences.sCn: 他的右脸上有一道弯弯的长疤。

exam.question: The cut in her hand has healed completely, without leaving a ______.

answer.explain: 句意： 她手上的刀伤已经痊愈， 没有留下伤疤。defect： 过失； sign： 标记； wound： 创伤。

remMethod.val: 电影《狮子王》中有一只狮子名叫刀疤(scar)

words.tran: 在…上划痕；乱划；严厉批评

trans.tranOther: a permanent mark that is left on your skin after you have had a cut or wound
